show.title: Emperor Yan
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://links.kukufm.com/LHCf84
show.description:
He married her under a hidden name, helped her rise — but was repaid with betrayal.
On her birthday, he was humiliated and thrown out by her greedy sister and scheming allies.
Just then, his true identity is revealed… and his powerful fiancée from Yanjing makes a dramatic entrance!
show.description_secondary:
He married her under a hidden name, helped her rise — but was repaid with betrayal.
On her birthday, he was humiliated and thrown out by her greedy sister and scheming allies.
Just then, his true identity is revealed… and his powerful fiancée from Yanjing makes a dramatic entrance!
